snippets.name: /etc/passwd priv_esc
snippets.code:
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y vim python php-cli whois openssl

RUN useradd user1

RUN echo 'user1:pass123' | chpasswd

RUN chmod o=rw /etc/passwd

USER user1
snippets.description: Configuration that makes the file /etc/passwd editable

snippets.name: ld_preload priv_esc
snippets.code:
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y sudo vim build-essential

RUN useradd user1

RUN echo 'user1:pass123' | chpasswd

RUN echo 'user1 ALL=(root) NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/find' | sudo EDITOR='tee -a' visudo

RUN echo 'Defaults env_keep += LD_PRELOAD' | sudo EDITOR='tee -a' visudo

USER user1
snippets.description: Dockerfile configuration for ld_preload privilege escalation

snippets.name: suid priv_esc
snippets.code:
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y vim nano build-essential

RUN useradd user1

RUN echo 'user1:pass123' | chpasswd

RUN chmod u+s /bin/cp

RUN chmod u+s /usr/bin/find

RUN chmod u+s /usr/bin/vim.basic

RUN chmod u+s /bin/nano

RUN echo "H4sIANIThl4AA1XKMQrDMAxA0Tk6hbEXe6m7J+QuSSwaQa2GSB5MyN1rL4VOHx7fEW/vktBMook+j30G96PC1PTfpErUeqB0BmI1eSH2AS4YBLVQ8i9U7A1hbFZFMXsbV+K4LrLbrmc7TzbPEW74AlJpq/+DAAAA" | base64 -d | gunzip > /asroot.c

RUN gcc /asroot.c -o /shell

RUN chmod u+s /shell

USER user1
snippets.description: Dockerfile configuration for a few suid binaries: cp, find, vim, nano and custom /shell

snippets.name: sudo priv_esc
snippets.code:
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y sudo vim python-minimal less man ftp socat build-essential

RUN useradd user1

RUN echo 'user1:pass123' | chpasswd

RUN echo "H4sIABMZhl4AA1NWVNBPyszTT0oszuDiQjABbaBnUxgAAAA=" | base64 -d | gunzip > /asroot.sh

RUN echo "H4sIAKYZhl4AA1NWVNAvLS7ST8rM0y+oLMnIz+PiyswtyC8qUcgv5uLKL9YrriwuSc3VUAIrSUoszlDS5AIAkslS8TYAAAA=" | base64 -d | gunzip > /asroot.py

RUN echo "H4sIANIThl4AA1XKMQrDMAxA0Tk6hbEXe6m7J+QuSSwaQa2GSB5MyN1rL4VOHx7fEW/vktBMook+j30G96PC1PTfpErUeqB0BmI1eSH2AS4YBLVQ8i9U7A1hbFZFMXsbV+K4LrLbrmc7TzbPEW74AlJpq/+DAAAA" | base64 -d | gunzip > /asroot.c

RUN gcc /asroot.c -o /shell

RUN echo 'user1 ALL=(root) NOPASSWD: /usr/bin/find, /usr/bin/perl, /usr/bin/python, /usr/bin/less, /usr/bin/awk, /usr/bin/man, /usr/bin/vim, /usr/bin/env, /usr/bin/ftp, /usr/bin/scp, /usr/bin/socat, /asroot.py, /asroot.sh, /shell' | sudo EDITOR='tee -a' visudo

USER user1
snippets.description: Dockerfile configuration for privilege escalation abusing sudo rights: find, perl, python, less, awk, man, vim, env, ftp, scp, socat and custom shells

snippets.name: cronjobs priv_esc
snippets.code:
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y sudo cron python-minimal tar

RUN useradd user1

RUN echo 'user1:pass123' | chpasswd

RUN echo "H4sIALOhlV4AAzWLSQqAMAwA73lFxENV0Nz9jUrAgl1IU7G/8S2+zIJ4G4aZtqGchFbrif2JsegePFgXgyiG9FMqCVTKDM/93NVPVSi7zojDUZD24Ji2gxefIw1oeuBr46jfUJfaT3xZ7Xp4AeAd5NVzAAAA" | base64 -d | gunzip > /tmp/cleanup.py

RUN mkdir -p /home/cleanup /var/backups/ /var/www/html

RUN echo "H4sIALOhlV4AAzWLSQqAMAwA73lFxENV0Nz9jUrAgl1IU7G/8S2+zIJ4G4aZtqGchFbrif2JsegePFgXgyiG9FMqCVTKDM/93NVPVSi7zojDUZD24Ji2gxefIw1oeuBr46jfUJfaT3xZ7Xp4AeAd5NVzAAAA" | base64 -d | gunzip > /var/www/html/cleanup.py

RUN sed -i '$ i */2 *   * * *   root    /tmp/cleanup.py' /etc/crontab

RUN sed -i '$ i */1 *   * * *   root    tar -zcf /var/backups/html.tgz /var/www/html/*' /etc/crontab

RUN chmod 777 /var/www/html

USER user1

ENTRYPOINT service cron restart
snippets.description: Dockerfile configuration for privilege escalation using linux scheduled cron jobs

snippets.name: PATH priv_esc
snippets.code:
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y vim nano build-essential

RUN useradd user1

RUN echo 'user1:pass123' | chpasswd

RUN mkdir /script && chmod 777 /script

RUN echo "H4sIANmxlV4AA1POzEvOKU1JVbApzcssLknRy7Dj4irLz0xRyE3MzNPQ5Krm4ixOLSnNTNEw0LQGs9Ph7MriktRcDaWCYiUgt5YLAOY/YRtMAAAA" | base64 -d | gunzip > /script/shell_ps.c

RUN echo "H4sIAGKylV4AA1POzEvOKU1JVbApzcssLknRy7Dj4irLz0xRyE3MzNPQ5Krm4ixOLSnNTNEw0LQGs9Ph7MriktRcDaXkxBIF/dzidL2SihIloEQtFwARCX6IVgAAAA=="| base64 -d | gunzip > /script/shell_cat_msg.c

RUN echo "H4sIAL6ylV4AA1POzEvOKU1JVbApzcssLknRy7Dj4irLz0xRyE3MzNPQ5Krm4ixOLSnNTNEw0LQGs9Ph7MriktRcDaXkxBIF/dSSZP2CxOLi8hQloFwtFwBU3KN1WQAAAA==" | base64 -d | gunzip > /script/shell_cat_etcpasswd.c

RUN echo "H4sIADSzlV4AA1POzEvOKU1JVbApzcssLknRy7DjKsvPTFHITczM09DkqubiLE4tKc1M0TDQtAaz0+HsyuKS1FwNpcwUJSC3losLAPy2BrFMAAAA" | base64 -d | gunzip > /script/shell_id.c

RUN echo "H4sIAJizlV4AAyupKMktTk/LzEnl4gIAxNFhSQwAAAA=" | base64 -d | gunzip > /msg.txt

RUN gcc /script/shell_ps.c -o /script/shell_ps

RUN gcc /script/shell_id.c -o /script/shell_id

RUN gcc /script/shell_cat_etcpasswd.c -o /script/shell_cat_etcpasswd

RUN gcc /script/shell_cat_msg.c -o /script/shell_cat_msg

RUN chmod u+s /script/shell_ps

RUN chmod u+s /script/shell_id

RUN chmod u+s /script/shell_cat_msg

RUN chmod u+s /script/shell_cat_etcpasswd

USER user1
snippets.description: Dockerfile configuration for privilege escalation using PATH environment variable

categories.name: privilege_escalation
